name: xstate-timer
description:
A XState statechart Timer implementation. Meant to be reusable.
All input to the timer is given in the initial context `config` property. 
It handles stopclock and timer mode, depending on config.duration is given or not. Features start/stop/pause/resume/lap-times, as well as options to auto-start the timer on creation and whether or not to auto-finalize  on completion.
The React component UI is just for testing. Using just simple styling.
Written in Typescript.
author: Ronny Hanssen <super.ronny@gmail.com>  (https://github.com/Spiralis)
